title: Waverly Charmed Life Valances for Windows Rod Pocket Curtains for -Kitchen and Living Room, 52" x 18", Cornflower (15404052018CRF)
features: PREMIUM QUALITY - Masterly crafted 100% Cotton Valance curtains. Sold as a single valance.
THOUGHTFULLY SIZED - Valance measures 52" wide and 18" long.
STYLE - Bring classic elegance into any room of your home with Charmed Life valance by Waverly. This traditional panel features a classic French country toile scene with coordinating solid trim.
EASY SET UP - Rod Pocket design fits any standard or decorative rod for quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures.
description: Refresh any room in your home with classically elegant window treatments by Waverly. Exquisite and versatile, the charmed life valance features a classic French country toile scene with coordinating solid trim. Pair with the charmed life curtain line to complete the look. Valance measures 52 inch wide x 18 inch long. Hang coordinating panels and valance on standard or decorative curtain rod. 2 inch header adds decorative flair. 3 inch rod is recommended with up to a 1. 5 inch rod. Curtain rod sold separately. 100Percent cotton, unlined. Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Tumble dry low. Imported.
